description: For a long time I had no idea what AMP actually is, when it should be used and how one could benefit from it. Today I decided to find it out. To cut a long story short, AMP is a Google alternative to Telegram's `InstantView`, Facebook's `Instant Articles`, Yandex's `Turbo Pages` and Apple's `News` just to name a few. It allows to open pages "instantly" at Google search results and a few partners (e.g. Twitter AFAIK).
